author: CTPPS
body:
This PR introduces a better visualization for HPTDC errors, organizing them per Digitizer Board (DB) and TDC.
Moreover, we add few cosmetic fixes and:
- test file to run the DQM locally using dat files
- fix for ctpps_dqm_sourceclient-live_cfg.py to introduce the use of onlineMetaDataDigis

Thanks
@forthommel @dfigueiredo
title: PPS Timing Diamond: DQM update
